title: Intrigued
description: something or someone who arouses curiosity or interest or fascination. For Grace Summers, Daniel Romano is the personification of that verb. A perfect stranger to have a perfectly wild one-night stand with, but he’s definitely not the kind she wants in her life on a day-to-day basis. She has enough trouble as is, she doesn’t need a playboy billionaire who can’t take no for an answer. making secret plans to do something illicit. Oh, he has plans alright, and some of them could get him behind bars. Once Daniel has had a taste of the sensual beauty, he knows that once wouldn't be enough. And the plans he has for her... But God forbid, the stubborn woman is hell-bent on keeping him from getting under her skin and her tight fitting corporate skirts. But, Daniel isn’t a quitter. And the prim and proper Ms. Summers needs a few lessons in the bedroom on how to loosen up.Will Grace’s stubborn will triumph over Daniel’s allure? Or will Daniel find a way to let her surrender both her body and her heart?True to its title, Intrigued will have you pining for more. This billionaire romance will make your nights sultry with Grace and Daniel. Grab your copy now!
author: Anna Kendra
